title: What to do if you get permanently suspended
body: Guys i have been permanently suspended and do not know what to do, i tried to change my email address because i put my old one and it got hacked and now i dont know the password. What can i do to get the account back or talk to rito about some changes i will make in the future.

replies.body:
There's no such thing as permanently banned, it's only 256 years.
Lol.

If you were permabanned for something you did, you won't get it back. That's kind of the idea of permanent bans.

If someone hacked your account or you believe you were wrongfully punished, you can submit a ticket to Riot Support.
